arts.ttl: Woltemade overjoyed after third Stuttgart win in a row: "It was a spectacle"
arts.sum: Nick Woltemade was in high spirits after VfB Stuttgart extended their winning run to three games with a comfortable 4-0 win over Freiburg.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bayern, Stuttgart, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim; Bochum hold Leipzig in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: Matchday 19 brought a plentiful supply of goals and thrilling action to the Bundesrepublik. Stuttgart cruised to a big victory over Freiburg. Bayern, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim all bagged three vital points each. Bochum overturned a three-goal deficit to draw with Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart dismantle Freiburg in statement 4-0 victory
arts.sum: Stuttgart secured a convincing 4-0 win over Freiburg, with goals from Rouault, Demirović, Woltemade, and Undav. Stuttgart continued to dominate, with Demirović nearly scoring his second of the match around the half-hour mark, only for VAR to rule it out for offside.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga transfer updates: Eintracht Frankfurt settle on €3.5m for Jens Petter Hauge, Stuttgart prospect Jovan Milosevic receives new loan
arts.sum: As Bundesliga transfer January activity continues across the Bundesrepublik, Eintracht Frankfurt and VfB Stuttgart have confirmed transactions over the past 24 hours.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. Freiburg preview: Die Schwaben looking to maintain perfect start to 2025
arts.sum: Stuttgart will look to claim a third consecutive league win when they welcome Freiburg to the MHP Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
